QuestData.Title: Enemies Below
QuestData.Description: Orgrimmar's Ragefire Chasm has been taken by the Dark Shaman. $n, we cannot allow this to pass unpunished, lest they next set their sights on Thunder Bluff.$B$BGo speak with Commander Bagran just inside the Chasm. Help him in any way you can, for our fates are intertwined.
